import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import './styles.css'; import { USER_ACCOUNT_TYPE } from '../../constants'; class Sidebar extends Component { state = { user: this.props.activeUser, profilePic: 'https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qDc5kIFIhb8/UoJEpGN9DmI/AAAAAAABl1s/BfP6FcBY1R8/s1600/BlueHead.jpg', }; getUserNavOptions = () => { return (
Overview Trends Reminders Calendar Check-In
); }; getAdminNavOptions = () => { return (
Users Trends Reminders Check-In
); }; render() { return (

{this.state.user?.firstName}

{this.props.activeUser?.type === USER_ACCOUNT_TYPE ? this.getUserNavOptions() : this.getAdminNavOptions()}
); } } export default Sidebar;
